page.title: 17Fishing In Oulton Beck?
page.content: Oulton Beck,which is a tributary of the River Aire,is very badly polluted because of discharge of sewage from inefficient sewage works.But it is hoped to clean up the beck so that by 1995 people will be able to fish in it.The Yorkshire Water Authority is waiting for final approval for a scheme to clean up the beck.Mrs Brockleby,secretary of Oulton Civic Society, is looking forward to the beck being cleaned up."It should be marvellous. I think the people of Oulton will be delighted to hear the news.The beck has needed cleaning for some considerable time.I am glad that the Yorkshire Water Authoity are doing something at last,now we can look forward to a spot of fishing".
